hockeystick 0.3.3
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Manage cached datasets

Source: R/data_cache.R
hockeystick_cache.Rd

Manage cached datasets

hockeystick_cache_list()

hockeystick_cache_delete(files, force = TRUE)

hockeystick_cache_delete_all(force = TRUE)

hockeystick_cache_details(files = NULL)

hockeystick_update_all()

Arguments

files

(character) one or more complete file names
force

(logical) Should files be force deleted? Default: TRUE

Details

cache_delete only accepts 1 file name, while cache_delete_all doesn't accept any names, but deletes all files. For deleting many specific files, use cache_delete in a lapply() type call

We cache using rappdirs::user_cache_dir(), find your cache folder by executing rappdirs::user_cache_dir("hockeystick")

Functions

  • hockeystick_cache_list() returns a character vector of full path file names

  • hockeystick_cache_delete() deletes one or more files, returns nothing

  • hockeystick_cache_delete_all() delete all files, returns nothing

  • hockeystick_cache_details() prints file name and file size for each file, supply with one or more files, or no files (and get details for all available)

  • hockeystick_update_all() updates the cache with the latest co2, temperature, sea level, and sea ice data.

References

Caching data sets: ROpenSci guide to persistent config and data for R packages: https://blog.r-hub.io/2020/03/12/user-preferences/

Examples

# \donttest{
# list files in cache
hockeystick_cache_list()

#> [1] "C:\\Users\\hch\\AppData\\Local\\hockeystick\\hockeystick\\Cache/gisstemp.rds" 
#> [2] "C:\\Users\\hch\\AppData\\Local\\hockeystick\\hockeystick\\Cache/icecurves.rds"
#> [3] "C:\\Users\\hch\\AppData\\Local\\hockeystick\\hockeystick\\Cache/maunaloa.rds" 
#> [4] "C:\\Users\\hch\\AppData\\Local\\hockeystick\\hockeystick\\Cache/paleo.rds"    
#> [5] "C:\\Users\\hch\\AppData\\Local\\hockeystick\\hockeystick\\Cache/seaice.rds"   
#> [6] "C:\\Users\\hch\\AppData\\Local\\hockeystick\\hockeystick\\Cache/sealevel.rds" 

# List info for single files
hockeystick_cache_details(files = hockeystick_cache_list()[1])

#> <hockeystick cached files>
#>   directory: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/gisstemp.rds
#>   size: 5.3 kB
#>   date: 2020-08-18 11:52:38
#> 
hockeystick_cache_details(files = hockeystick_cache_list()[2])

#> <hockeystick cached files>
#>   directory: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/icecurves.rds
#>   size: 1.7 kB
#>   date: 2020-12-24 21:16:57
#> 

# List info for all files
hockeystick_cache_details()

#> <hockeystick cached files>
#>   directory: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/gisstemp.rds
#>   size: 5.3 kB
#>   date: 2020-08-18 11:52:38
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/icecurves.rds
#>   size: 1.7 kB
#>   date: 2020-12-24 21:16:57
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/maunaloa.rds
#>   size: 9.3 kB
#>   date: 2020-12-24 21:16:43
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/paleo.rds
#>   size: 20.2 kB
#>   date: 2020-12-24 21:16:59
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/seaice.rds
#>   size: 0.5 kB
#>   date: 2020-12-24 21:17:01
#> 
#>   file: C:\Users\hch\AppData\Local\hockeystick\hockeystick\Cache/sealevel.rds
#>   size: 15.8 kB
#>   date: 2020-12-24 21:17:03
#> 

# Delete files by name in cache
# hockeystick_cache_delete(files = hockeystick_cache_list()[1])

# Delete all files in cache
# hockeystick_cache_delete_all()

# Update all cached data
# hockeustick_update_all()
# }
